Content.Data:
Content for CWE ID: 117

Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 347
Cwe : 117
IsExecutable : true
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 1
PackageId : 22
Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList Inputs = Find_Read()+Find_DB();
CxList Log = Find_Methods().FindByShortName("syslog");
Log += Find_Write().FindByName("*.clog.*");

CxList sanitize = Find_Sanitize();

result = Log.InfluencedByAndNotSanitized(Inputs, sanitize);
